title: 12/20: Start or Sit (AFC); Josh Gordon News (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We begin with some rankings debates of Philip Rivers and Tom Brady (we also discuss Josh Gordon BEFORE hearing the latest news), get into Jamey's Start of the Week (8:55) and preview Heath's upcoming championship matchup with an 8-year old (13:08) ... News and notes (15:15), our reaction to the Josh Gordon news as it breaks (19:08) and a NEW Die Hard debate that has nothing to do with Christmas (23:30)! ... WAS-TEN (26:55), CIN-CLE (29:25), BAL-LAC (37:35), BUF-NE (44:15), DEN-OAK (50:45), GB-NYJ (53:51), NYG-IND (59:15), JAC-MIA (1:03:40) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: We're reacting to the Josh Gordon news as it breaks (19:08) and also previewing the AFC home games with some rankings debates and good RB discussions.
